content: Asian pay television channelTelevision channel **Comedy Central** was a television channel owned by [ViacomCBS](/wiki/ViacomCBS), broadcasting in [Southeast Asia](/wiki/Southeast_Asia) and the domestic version of the international [Comedy Central](/wiki/Comedy_Central) network. ## History It was launched on November 1, 2012. The channel was first launched in Singapore, followed by other countries in Asia. The network aired most of the post-2000 [programming seen on the American network](/wiki/List_of_programs_broadcast_by_Comedy_Central), along with various other programming, both from other ViacomCBS networks and acquired through syndication. On 1 September 2014, this channel was launched in Malaysia. The channel closed on February 1, 2021, together with [MTV China](/wiki/MTV_Mandarin). ## Programming - *[Anger Management](/wiki/Anger_Management_(TV_series))* - *Asia Alarm* - *[Betty White's Off Their Rockers](/wiki/Betty_White%27s_Off_Their_Rockers)* - *[Brickleberry](/wiki/Brickleberry)* - *[Broad City](/wiki/Broad_City)* - *Brody Stevens: Enjoy It!* - *[The Burn with Jeff Ross](/wiki/The_Burn_with_Jeff_Ross)* - *[Celebrity Deathmatch](/wiki/Celebrity_Deathmatch)* - *[Comedy Central Roast](/wiki/Comedy_Central_Roast)* - *[Comedy Inc.](/wiki/Comedy_Inc._(Australian_TV_series))* - *[The Daily Show with Trevor Noah](/wiki/The_Daily_Show_with_Trevor_Noah)* - *[Dilbert](/wiki/Dilbert_(TV_series))* - *[Drunk History](/wiki/Drunk_History)* - *[Duckman](/wiki/Duckman)* - *[The Exes](/wiki/The_Exes)* - *[Futurama](/wiki/Futurama)* - *[Gary & Mike](/wiki/Gary_%26_Mike)* - *[Just for Laughs](/wiki/Just_for_Laughs_Gags)* - *[Happy Tree Friends](/wiki/Happy_Tree_Friends)* - *[I Live with Models](/wiki/I_Live_with_Models)* - *[Inside Amy Schumer](/wiki/Inside_Amy_Schumer)* - *[Just for Laughs](/wiki/Just_for_Laughs_Gags)* - *[Key & Peele](/wiki/Key_%26_Peele)* - *[Kroll Show](/wiki/Kroll_Show)* - *[The Life & Times of Tim](/wiki/The_Life_%26_Times_of_Tim)* - *[Lip Sync Battle](/wiki/Lip_Sync_Battle)* - *The Magic Crown* - *[Mind Your Language](/wiki/Mind_Your_Language)* - *[Mr. Bean](/wiki/Mr._Bean)* - *[Nathan for You](/wiki/Nathan_for_You)* - *[The Noose](/wiki/The_Noose_(TV_series))* - *[Out There](/wiki/Out_There_(2013_TV_series))* - *[The Sarah Silverman Program](/wiki/The_Sarah_Silverman_Program)* - *[Saturday Night Live](/wiki/Saturday_Night_Live)* - *[South Park](/wiki/South_Park)* - *Stand Up, Asia!* - *[Tosh.0](/wiki/Tosh.0)* - *[TripTank](/wiki/TripTank)* - *[Workaholics](/wiki/Workaholics)* - Official website
title: Comedy Central (Southeast Asia)
